name: restrengthen
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make someone or something strong again, or to become strong again: Try these exercises to re-strengthen your knees. The storm could restrengthen as it moves away from the area.
More examplesFewer examplesThe containers are very strong, but if you cut them, you may need to add strips of material to re-strengthen them.This herbal preparation will re-strengthen the Qi energy in your body, giving you more vitality in your daily life.The storm is forecast to weaken briefly and then restrengthen over the Gulf of Mexico.
